overview:
Elkie Holland is a Recruitment Consultant with over 20 years experience of finding and providing quality IT staff.

Elkie Holland particularly enjoys working closely with businesses assisting in search and selection for key roles. Her distinctive brand of honesty (always to “tell it like it is”) mixed with her integrity and humour helps build enjoyable and long lasting relationships. This also helps her to succeeed in filling the roles !

Elkie is always interested and enjoys in “hard to fill” requirements which others might find challenging. Searches are done using a mix of traditional and modern recruitment methods.
